GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v4.19.228
GSD.description:
ASoC: max9759: fix underflow in speaker_gain_control_put()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.228 by commit a0f49d12547d45ea8b0f356a96632dd503941c1e, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit fa8d915172b8c10ec0734c4021e99e9705023b07. For more details please see the references link.
